text.section:
In addition to any powers set forth elsewhere, the Secretary may:
adopt regulations to carry out this title;
use any member of the Department of State Police, as necessary, to carry out and enforce this title; and
make inquiries and conduct an investigation regarding any applicant:
for a license; or
for employment with a licensee as a private detective.

In addition to any duties set forth elsewhere, the Secretary shall:
adopt regulations that set standards for the certification of employees of private detective agencies as private detectives;
keep a roster of the individuals certified as private detectives under this title, including on the roster:
the names of individuals certified;
the name of the licensed private detective agency with or by which each individual is associated or employed; and
any other information that the Secretary considers appropriate; and
adopt by regulation a schedule of fines for violations of this title that may be assessed by the Secretary under §§ 13-313 and 13-409 of this title.
